text: Gu nimen dang zhaijie you shu de ruogan ri. Nimen zhong youhaibing huo luxing de ren, dang yi suo que de ri shu bu zhai. Nanyi zhaijie zhe, dang na fa shu, ji yi yi can fan, shi gei yige pinmin. Ziyuan xingshan zhe, bi huo geng duo de shan bao. Zhaijie duiyu nimen shi geng hao de, ruguo nimen zhidao.
